TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

Tunable.name: UNIVERSITY_HOUSING_VENUE_TUNING
Tunable.description: The university housing venue. This should be kept in sync with the same tunable in university_housing_tuning.py and we would ideally just reference the get_university_housing_zone_ids in there, but doing so causes a circular import.

Tunable.name: ANY_FILTER
Tunable.description: A filter used for creating debug sims in your neighborhood.

Tunable.name: BLANK_FILTER
Tunable.description: A filter that is used when a filter of None is passed in. This filter should have no filter terms.

Tunable.name: TOP_NUMBER_OF_SIMS_TO_LOOK_AT
Tunable.display: Top Number Of Sims To Look At
Tunable.description: When running a filter request and doing a weighted random, how many of the top scorers will be used to get the results.

Tunable.name: UNIMPORTANT_FILTER
Tunable.description: A filter used to find Sims that are considered unimportant. Unimportant Sims can be used as a fallback before generating new SimInfos in the case a filter request fails. This allows us to conserve SimInfos.
